name: Last Defenders
description:
What do you get if you combine an cards, tanks & ... monastic order? LAST DEFENDERS. The corruption must be purged.



Last Defenders brings unique and agile based movement, inspired by classic games titles, set in a historic, energized setting. Fight to the end, and discover the truth behind losing. And tanks.

features

  • Singleplayer
  • Online LeaderBoard
  • Historical skins
  • DEUS VULT
